title: Alex Jones Show - 2013 Mar 24 SU [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show
Sunday, 24 Mar 2013


[sebaygo1]

On the Sunday, March 24 broadcast of the Alex Jones Show, Alex exposes the globalist takeover creeping over the U.S. and other nations with special guests: George Noory, host of the most listened to overnight radio program in North America Coast to Coast AM, and in-studio guest activist, speaker and author of Behind The Green Mask: U.N. Agenda 21, Rosa Koire. Also, read Army Captain Terry M. Hestilow's letter to Sen. Cornyn and watch Alex's latest videos on the presidency's dictatorial rise to power and the coup dÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÂ©tat against America's Constitutional Republic.

Note: this show consists of previously aired material.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually essential 
 to seek information from a variety of sources, to listen to a
 spectrum of voices in order to better  understand the "big 
 picture." A reliance solely upon mainstream corporate media 
 for news and info is a prescription for ignorance. I try to
 share information that counters the monotone of mainstream
 corporate media. 

 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents.

 Think for yourself! To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
